DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the association between surgery of the cataract and posterior vitreous detachment, in the emmetropic patient, by comparing eyes operated with eyes not operated in the same group of patients
DOC.brief_title: Effect on the Vitreous of the Not Complicated Surgery of the Cataract to the Emmetropic Patient
DOC.criteria: Adult emmetropic patient Without complete posterior vitreus detachment in both eyes before having surgery. Diabetic retinopathy Ophthalmological treatment in progress History of ophthalmological surgery
